reviewText: Loved the first one - can't wait to watch this one!
What can I say, if you see one movie you must see all of the seven movies.  The best Japanese movies ever.
Once again our hero and son are back to do battle with evil and of course win. As always great sword play action and high drama that leaves you wantting more.

One of my favorite installations in the series, Ogami Itto's standard advance fee is paid to him in five installments, a welcome change of pace for fans. But never fear, Daigoro is still up to his babycart tricks

Finally Ogami meets his match in obscure utterances and is defeated by a monk. The entire series is fraught with Buddhist teachings but this installation makes an extra effort to explain them to Westerners
I liked all 5 installments of the Shogun Assassin, each storyline was unique and interesting!

i looked for this in many stores and no one even had it.
So of course I got it from [...]!

And this DVD will not disappoint.
Every second of this movie is intense.

I wish they made movies as serious as this now..
no bad one-liners, no actors too young for their roles,
no goofy CG...
hardcore action and awesome story!
Watch this in the dark & kick up the volume!!

become a Samurai!

The DVD would have been better with dual audio (Japanese and English).
same as i said about the third movie
Great addition. Ordered it for my brother who had all but this one. Ordered it while visiting him and was delivered in 2 days. The movie was great.
Love the shogun assassin series , all are great movies , the action is better than the crap they try to pass off today as action in a movie
thanks
A great movie
great dvd

THIS IS AN OUTSTANDING QUINTET SURROUNDNG THE STORY OF AN EX-SHOGUN GONE RENEGADE AND HIS YOUNG SON BEING HUNTED BY HIS FORMER SHOGUN EMPEROR'S SOLDIERS ..... OR BY ANY TAKERS WHO THINK THEY CAN KILL HIM !  THIS IS 4 OF 5 INSTALLMENTS.  ONCE YOU START WATCHING....  IT'S  VERY ADDICTIVE.  I PROMISE YOU.
